column1: declare_heavenly_china_desc;We have defeated the Manchu overlords with the help of our lord and savior
column2: Jesus Christ. It is now time to declare China a holy kingdom
column3: which follows his teachings to their fullest extent.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_christian_missionaries_desc;We are a christian nation without a christian people
column2: this is unacceptable. We must invite missionaries to help sway our population to the true faith. If we're lucky
column3: they might even bring with them western advancements.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: christianity_with_chinese_characteristics_desc;We are the most christian of all nations
column2: the westerners have the right idea but their minds are clouded. Our ancestors
column6: must have been even holier than several western theologians. We must follow the lord and his word
column7: but without losing our most holy and noble heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_mandate_of_heaven_desc;While we'd rather distance ourselves from old traditions it's now become more and more clear that we can never fully claim the right to China without also following one of the oldest of Chinese monarchial principals; The Mandate of Heaven
column4: bestowed from heaven itself. To fully legitimize our rule over all of China we must use this justification
column5: however to do this we must prove that heaven truly is with us.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: heavenly_china_desc;China is now a christian nation with strict moral laws.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
chinese_christianity_desc;China is a christian nation with strict moral laws
column2: but that has not forgotten the wise and holy words of our ancestors.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160027;We no longer believe in the superiority of religion over state and must therefore rid ourselves of the moralist laws of our predecessors. China will no longer be dictated by the restrictive and oppressive laws that were proclaimed by the

column2: the now christian nation that is China
column3: requested help in converting the population
column4: several of our clergymen have moved to help the Chinese cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
